sentences.en: A fireball will invariably appear in your camera's field of view in between exposures.
sentences.cn: 火流星永远会出现在你相机的视场中,只不过总是在曝光间隔出现.

sentences.en: A fireball will invariably miss your camera's field of view by a couple degrees.
sentences.cn: 火流星会在你相机的视场外几度的地方出现.

sentences.en: An extremely hot fireball is seen that often outshines the host galaxy.
sentences.cn: 我们看到流星通常就是发着光照亮了银河系.

sentences.en: And from this fireball, multi - colored sparkles flashed everywhere.
sentences.cn: 从火球中喷出的各种颜色的火花照亮了各个角落.

sentences.en: At that time, Ray heard a sound and saw a fireball hit the plant under construction.
sentences.cn: 当时听到一声雷响,并看到一火球击向在建厂房.

sentences.en: Ice bolt, fireball, and chain lighting were my destructive spells. I also got Puppet Master.
sentences.cn: 破坏魔法有冰箭, 火球,连闪,我还学到了控制.

sentences.en: Improved Fireball: The reduction in damage coefficient caused by this talent has been removed.
sentences.cn: 强化火球术: 减少伤害的系数已经从这个天赋中移除.

sentences.en: Master Of Fire Grants armor - damaging effect to Fireball and Armageddon spells.
sentences.cn: 大师级火焰使火球术和末日审判产生对对方防御力的削弱.

sentences.en: Missile; 6 MP , Range 7, AOE 1; Fireball that damages foes, burns fields, and melts snow.
sentences.cn: 投射; 6MP, 射程7, 效果范围1; 伤害敌人的火球, 燃烧草地, 融化雪地.

sentences.en: Modified fire skills: Fireball: larger aoe , Blast Phoenix: number of phoenixes increased.
sentences.cn: 修改消防技能: 火球: 大奥厄, 高炉凤凰: 凤凰数量的增加.

sentences.en: The jet exploded in midair and turned into a fireball.
sentences.cn: 那架喷气式飞机在半空爆炸，变成了一团火球。

sentences.en: The paper is aimed to present the author's model to the fireball radiation consequence calculation.
sentences.cn: 目前,失效后果评价中计算火球热辐射距离时存在多种假设,制约了结果的准确性.

sentences.en: What are a paladin or a fireball in our world?
sentences.cn: 在这个世界里,什么是圣骑士,什么是火球?

sentences.en: When a fireball appears you will invariably be recording a + 5 m meteor.
sentences.cn: 火流星出现时,你会正好在记录一颗+5等的流星.

sentences.en: You must be a fireball at work.
sentences.cn: 你工作起来一定是很卖命吧.

words.tran_cn: （热核武器爆炸后在空中出现的）[核]火球；[天]大流星；精力充沛的人

trans.tran_cn: 火球，大流星，（旧式）燃烧弹，<美口>工作起来劲头十足的人
trans.tran_en: a ball of fire, especially one caused by an explosion
